mapper.select: select cm.chtt_room_no, chtt_room_nm , cm.emp_no, emp_nm from employee e, chatting_room cr left outer join chatting_member cm on (cr.chtt_room_no = cm.chtt_room_no) where e.emp_no = cm.emp_no and cr.chtt_room_no = #{chttRoomNo}

select EMP_NO , EMP_TELNO , EMP_ADRES1 , EMP_NM , EMP_ENCPN , EMP_CLSF , EMP_SE , EMP_SEXDSTN , EMP_PROFILE , EMP_RRNO1 , EMP_ADRES2 , EMP_EXP , EMP_RGSDE , EMP_NO , EMP_HFFC_AT , EMP_UPDDE , EMP_EMAIL from employee order by emp_nm

SELECT a.chtt_room_no, b.indvdl_setup_room_nm, b.chtt_last, MAX(c.chtt_de) as chttDe, MAX(c.chtt_room_indx) as chttRoomIndx, ( SELECT MAX(cc.chtt_cn) FROM chatting_contents cc WHERE cc.chtt_room_no = c.chtt_room_no AND cc.chtt_de = ( SELECT MAX(ccc.chtt_de) FROM chatting_contents ccc WHERE ccc.chtt_room_no = cc.chtt_room_no ) ) AS chttCn FROM chatting_room a JOIN ( SELECT * FROM chatting_member WHERE emp_no = #{sessionUserId} ) b ON a.chtt_room_no = b.chtt_room_no JOIN chatting_contents c ON a.chtt_room_no = c.chtt_room_no GROUP BY a.chtt_room_no, b.indvdl_setup_room_nm, b.chtt_last ORDER BY MAX(c.chtt_indx) DESC

select chtt_indx, chtt_room_indx , a.emp_no, emp_nm, emp_se, emp_profile , chtt_cn, chtt_atchmnfl, chtt_de, chtt_extsn, chtt_file_nm from chatting_contents a, employee b where a.emp_no = b.emp_no and chtt_room_no = #{chttRoomNo} order by chtt_room_indx
